entry.title: First Blog Post
entry.summary: Welcome to futurehacks blog! This is where we will post updates, stories and other relevant IT and event related notices including staff internal discussions and what to come!
entry.content:
Welcome to futurehacks blog! This is where we will post updates, stories and other relevant IT and event related notices including staff internal discussions and what to come!

Whats Cooking

  • Staff are internally testing and optimizing our docker container setups for testing.
  • Upcoming banner logo
  • Soldering Guidelines
  • Code checkers/Analyses

Staff quote of the day?

Teach a chap how to code they gonna be pained for a lifetime. Teach AI to code? You have twice as many problems
